en-US.summary: Listen to Wave FM, less bla bla bla, more la la la.
examplePhrases: Alexa, ask Wave FM to play
en-US.name: Wave FM
en-US.description:
Listen to Wave FM, with less bla bla bla, and more la la la.

Wave FM provides a high quality sound 24/7 with the best music.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch Wave FM" or "Alexa, play Wave FM" to start the radio".

At anytime, you can stop the radio by saying "Alexa, stop"
